## Project Details
- **Type**: Blazor Server Web Application
- **Purpose**: Event management system for EventEase company
- **Features**: Browse events, view event details, register for events

## How to Run
1. Open terminal in Visual Studio Code
2. Run: `dotnet run`
3. Navigate to the URL shown in the terminal (typically https://localhost:5001)

## Project Components Created
- Event Model (Models/Event.cs)
- EventService (Services/EventService.cs)
- Home Page (Components/Pages/Home.razor)
- Events List Page (Components/Pages/Events.razor)
- Event Details Page (Components/Pages/EventDetails.razor)
- Event Registration Page (Components/Pages/EventRegistration.razor)
- Updated Navigation (Components/Layout/NavMenu.razor)
